about_the_game:
Have you ever crushed on someone you worked with? Don't worry...you're not alone. George has been working with Mari for several months, but from the first moment he laid eyes on her, he was smitten. Mari was nice to him, and even flirted with him, but a smart girl like that would never be interested in a guy like him, right?

As a wise man once said, you can't win if you don't even try. So when Mari opened the door - both metaphorically and literally - George stepped through. What he found once he was inside, though, far exceeded his wildest imagination! There was more to Mari than met the eye...much more! On a rainy Saturday afternoon, George embarks on a journey of discovery, both of himself and of the secrets that Mari has hidden from everyone at the office...until now.

Mistress Marigold's Home Improvement is an Adult Visual Novel (AVN) in the form of a kinetic (linear) short story. You will play as George and get to know Mari in every way possible. Play your cards right, and you just might find yourself in her inner circle...and what a circle it is!

We currently offer this title in the following languages by way of machine translations:

  • US English (native language)

  • Simplified Chinese

  • French

  • Japanese

  • Polish

  • Portuguese - Brazil

  • Portuguese - Portugal

  • Russian

  • Spanish

  • Swedish

NOTE: All languages other than US English are a work in progress, and not yet considered final. If you discover issues in the language you select and would like to help improve our translations, please visit our Discord and let us know.

legal_notice:
The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this production are fictitious. No identification with actual persons (living or deceased), places, buildings, and products is intended or should be inferred.

All assets included in this product were either created by Doc62 Productions or purchased from reputable sources. Some free assets are included, as well, with attribution to those creators included on the "About" page accessible from the main menu.

You play as George, who has admired Mari - his coworker - from afar. One lucky Saturday, she invites him to become a bigger part of her life. Let the fun begin!
